X forwarding, you need to either specify -X to ssh, or configure it in ssh_config
then X forwarding is not enabled, you passed -X to ssh?
the -X should be before the host
echo $DISPLAY still doesn't give any output?
DISPLAY with all capital letters. Linux (and thus ubuntu) is mostly case sensitive
